definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :1 S 1Sa 6:9 accident, chance, for tune ;—abs. ´[[מ]]: 1Sa 6:9 +; cstr [[מִקְרֵה]] Ec 2:15 (so read also Ec 3:19, Ec 3:19 with LXX Ruët:Kau Wild, for MT [[מִקְרֶה]]);—
in Ec, fortune, fate, ´[[מ]]: [[אֶחָד יִקְרֶה אֶת־כֻּלָּם]] Ec 2:14 cf. v:Ec 2:15, Ec 3:19, Ec 3:19, Ec 3:19, Ec 9:2, Ec 9:3.
